replies.body:
"The crew's captain provides AD damage"
Attack Damage damage omegalul
I can't seem to unlock any augment slots even though i've played about 8 games of it, any help?

You get augment slots from completing missions, so keep an eye on what missions you have, and what you need to do to get the slots. Not all the missions give you one though, so if you don't have one as a reward, complete a few more missions!
But the first quest literally says "Play a game of Odyssey" and the reward is one augment slot

So you don't even have the first slot? I apologise if I misunderstood, I just know there has been some general confusion around augments.

To clarify, you have completed at least that first mission that gives you a slot, but you don't have any free slots for augments (beyond the one you start with and can't change)?

I have heard some whispers of missions taking a while to redeem/properly complete, so it's possible you were a victim of that issue. Have things updated for you now?
I really love how the community doesn't argue about the missions, and then doesn't troll. Amazing job making the missions. Please fire them all.
